summary:
## Human Evolution: A Simplified Summary

Humans evolved from ancient primates over millions of years. Our closest relatives are chimpanzees and bonobos. Early humans walked on two legs, developed clever hands, and learned complex language.

Our ancestors interbred with other human-like species, showing that evolution is complex, not a straight line. Scientists from different fields study human evolution by examining fossils, DNA, and ancient tools.
title: Human evolution
